statements: SELECT * FROM policy_expirations WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT policy_id, homeowner_name FROM policy_expirations WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE
SELECT homeowner_name, expiration_date FROM policy_expirations ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM policy_expirations WHERE homeowner_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT policy_id, expiration_date FROM policy_expirations WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE()
SELECT * FROM policy_expirations WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT policy_id, homeowner_name FROM policy_expirations WHERE reminder_sent = FALSE
SELECT homeowner_name FROM policy_expirations ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT policy_id, expiration_date FROM policy_expirations WHERE homeowner_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT COUNT(policy_id) AS total_policies FROM policy_expirations
SELECT * FROM policy_renewal;
SELECT homeowner_name, expiration_date FROM policy_renewal WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, homeowner_name FROM policy_renewal ORDER BY homeowner_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, expiration_date FROM policy_renewal WHERE homeowner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT notification_id, policy_id, notification_date FROM reminder_notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM policy_renewal WHERE policy_id = 100;
SELECT homeowner_name, expiration_date FROM policy_renewal WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT notification_date, reminder_message FROM reminder_notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT p.homeowner_name, r.reminder_message FROM policy_renewal p JOIN reminder_notifications r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id;
SELECT policy_id, homeowner_name, expiration_date FROM policy_renewal WHERE homeowner_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM policy;
SELECT homeowner_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_date, reminder_sent FROM reminder WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT homeowner_name, homeowner_email FROM homeowner;
SELECT * FROM policy WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND policy_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, homeowner_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy WHERE policy_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reminder WHERE reminder_date <= '2022-12-31' AND reminder_sent = false;
SELECT homeowner_name, homeowner_email FROM homeowner ORDER BY homeowner_name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date FROM policy WHERE homeowner_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY policy_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reminder WHERE reminder_sent = true ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policy;
SELECT homeowner_name, contact_email FROM Homeowner;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, expiration_date FROM Policy WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, reminder_date, status FROM RenewalReminder WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM RenewalLog WHERE renewal_successful IS TRUE ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policy JOIN Homeowner ON Policy.homeowner_id = Homeowner.homeowner_id;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, expiration_date FROM Policy WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT * FROM RenewalReminder WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT Homeowner.homeowner_name, Policy.policy_type FROM Homeowner INNER JOIN Policy ON Homeowner.homeowner_id = Policy.homeowner_id WHERE Policy.expiration_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT log_id, policy_id, renewal_date FROM RenewalLog WHERE renewal_successful = TRUE AND renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_managers;
SELECT id, policy_number, expiration_date FROM policy_managers WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM homeowners ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT reminder_date, message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT homeowner_id, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_managers WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE();
SELECT policy_number, expiration_date FROM policy_managers WHERE homeowner_id = 1234 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_history WHERE status = 'active' AND renewal_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM homeowners WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT message FROM reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-07-01';
